title: Casual Silver/Gold Team, all roles (I fill)
body:
I'm looking for a 5s team mostly to get a ranked team ward skin before the end of the season.
I'm currently gold 5, looking to recruit anyone in gold or silver this season or last season. 
I main jungle and support, but am acceptable at all roles.
Add me, my summoner name is "Meatloaf Snipe".
Once there is 5 on the team, we can start provisionals :)
Reply with your summoner name and rank.

Thanks :-)

replies.body:
IGN: TrufflesJr
Current Rank: S3

I'm an adc/supp main but I can play mid and jg

IGN: Bernout
Current Rank: G5

I'm a Sup main who can play mid and top. Looking for games to get the best ward by the end of the season.

Silver 5 
Support main followed closely by Varus as either adc or mid.

Rank gold II
Role Top Gnar darius maoki gp
I'm trying to get a ward skin too. I'd like to join, can do any role

Tay Zilla

Main Jung/Supp but can play tanks anywhere except adc

Rank: SIlver 5

I am looking for a team, main jungle, then mid and sup. I am almost silver III. Summoner name: buxtaart
